sentences.sContent: The couple enjoys lounging about the streets at weekends.
sentences.sContent_eng: The couple enjoys lounging about the streets at weekends.
sentences.sCn: 这对夫妇喜欢在周末逛街。

sentences.sContent: We should do something together at weekends so as to strengthen our relationship.
sentences.sContent_eng: We should do something together at weekends so as to strengthen our relationship.
sentences.sCn: 为了巩固我们的感情，我们应该在周末一起做一些事情。

synos.tran: （美）在周末，周末时光（等于on weekends）
